select hr_no, m_id, hr_name, hr_m_date, hr_people, m_name, hr_regdate, hr_progress FROM ( select LIST.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( select r.hr_no, m.m_id, r.hr_name, to_char(hr_m_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as hr_m_date, r.hr_people, m.m_name, to_char(hr_regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as hr_regdate, r.hr_progress FROM recruit r, member m where r.m_id = m.m_id and hr_status = 1
and m.m_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
order by hr_regdate desc )LIST )
RNUM BETWEEN #{start_row} AND #{end_row}
order by hr_regdate DESC

select recruit_seq.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO recruit (hr_no, m_id, hr_name, hr_address, hr_m_date, hr_people, hr_time, hr_m_type, hr_stadium, hr_nuiform, hr_level, hr_progress, hr_etc, hr_regdate, hr_status) values (recruit_seq.nextval, #{m_id}, #{hr_name}, #{hr_address}, to_date(#{hr_m_date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{hr_people}, #{hr_time}, #{hr_m_type}, #{hr_stadium}, #{hr_nuiform}, #{hr_level}, 1, #{hr_etc}, SYSDATE, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE recruit SET hr_name = #{hr_name}, hr_address = #{hr_address}, hr_m_date = to_date(#{hr_m_date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), hr_people = #{hr_people}, hr_time = #{hr_time}, hr_m_type = #{hr_m_type}, hr_stadium = #{hr_stadium}, hr_nuiform = #{hr_nuiform}, hr_level = #{hr_level}, hr_progress = #{hr_progress}, hr_etc = #{hr_etc} where hr_no = #{hr_no}
UPDATE recruit SET hr_progress = 0 where to_char(hr_m_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') < to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and hr_progress = 1
UPDATE recruit SET hr_status = 0 where hr_no = #{hr_no}
